#summary Deprecated backends
= Introduction =

In SANE Evolution some older backends will be removed,
provided that there is an available replacement. Deprecated
backends will be kept in the repository for a while. Once they
marked Removed they will be removed (d'oh!) .


= Deprecated =

 * coolscan2 (use coolscan3)


= Removed =

 * epson (use epson2)
 * coolscan (use coolscan3)
